original_text: And it came to pass, as she spake to Joseph day by day, that he hearkened not unto her, to lie by her, or to be with her.
korean_text: 여인이 날마다 요셉에게 청하였으나 요셉이 듣지 아니하여 동침하지 아니할 뿐더러 함께 있지도 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: as she spake to Joseph day by day
that he hearkened not unto her
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그녀의 말에 귀를 기울이지 않았다
